title: If you have Shaddoll Zefranaga and Zefraniu, Secret of the Yang Zing in your Pendulum Zones, which monsters can be Pendulum Summoned?
question: If you have Shaddoll Zefranaga and Zefraniu, Secret of the Yang Zing in your Pendulum Zones, which monsters can be Pendulum Summoned?
answer: In that case, since the Pendulum Effects of both cards are applied, as an end result you can only Pendulum Summon "Zefra" monsters.
llm_answer:
With **Shaddoll Zefranaga** and **Zefraniu, Secret of the Yang Zing** in your Pendulum Zones, you can only Pendulum Summon **"Shaddoll," "Zefra," and "Yang Zing"** monsters. 

**Resolution:** You can Pendulum Summon monsters from your Extra Deck or hand that belong to the "Shaddoll," "Zefra," or "Yang Zing" archetypes.
